subject: Golf
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, Sergio García and Martin Kaymer are among the highly ranked players passing on the first round of the PGA Tour’s version of the postseason, which begins Thursday.
snippet: Rory McIlroy, Sergio García and Martin Kaymer are among the highly ranked players passing on the first round of the PGA Tour’s version of the postseason, which begins Thursday.
